name: Lovers' Knot
description:
Lovers' Knot is a romance of chivalry. Walk the shadowed paths beneath the leaves of Broceliande, the drowned halls of the city of Ys. Can Rosalyn and Gawaine ever be united, or is their desperate search fated to last forever?

The game is a labyrinth where you may get lost, be turned back, see the same places twice or miss some turnings completely. Don't despair; there is a way forward to a happy ending.
